title: 17 "Cowboy Carter" Tour Beauty Buys, Including Beyoncé's Favorite Setting Spray
description: Ever since Beyoncé stunned the world with her foray into country music with the once-controversial-now-Grammy-winning "Cowboy Carter" album last year, our eyes have been glued to social media awaiting news of another worldwide tour. Feb. 1 became our lucky day when the legend announced she's hitting the road once again. While it won't be as lengthy as the iconic "Renaissance" World Tour that defined our summers nearly two years in a row, the 32-show rodeo is scheduled to commence at the end of this month, lasting through the end of July, which of course requires some serious preparation (like with anything involving Beyoncé). While we're gathering our best denim, cowboy hats, and all the star jewelry we could find, we're also paying attention to our makeup, nails, and hair to make sure we come correct for the Queen. While it remains to be seen what Bey's beauty looks will be, we're taking notes from the awe-inspiring moments she's delivered since the album's release - from the many red lips she's donned during her casual escapades to her ashy blond, bleached brows for the tour announcement visuals. We predict "Cowboy Carter" outfits will include Americana-inspired metallics and rhinestone-embellished blue jeans, so you can expect to lean into this aesthetic for your beauty details, too. If you're more of a maximalist, feel free to grab multicolored star face jewels to match your American flag-esque star nails or black lipstick to serve as a grungy complement to that black Stetson cowboy hat you've been eyeing. And if you're more of a minimalist, you can achieve your go-to makeup look and let your blond-like-Bey hair speak for itself. Whether you're seeing Beyoncé for the first time or attending this tour after missing out on all the Renaissance fun, we've rounded up the best beauty ideas that are sure to be approved by the star herself. From crystal face gems to bestselling setting spray to keep your glam fresh all night, these are the picks you'll want to secure ASAP. Keep reading to shop our picks for the best "Cowboy Carter"-inspired beauty products.
author: Naomi Parris
excerpt: From star-spangled banner nails to Beyoncé's favorite setting spray, here's everything you need for your Cowboy Carter Tour beauty look.
text: While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.Ever since Beyoncé stunned the world with her foray into country music with the once-controversial-now-Grammy-winning "Cowboy Carter" album last year, our eyes have been glued to social media awaiting news of another worldwide tour. Feb. 1 became our lucky day when the legend announced she's hitting the road once again. While it won't be as lengthy as the iconic "Renaissance" World Tour that defined our summers nearly two years in a row, the 32-show rodeo is scheduled to commence at the end of this month, lasting through the end of July, which of course requires some serious preparation (like with anything involving Beyoncé). While we're gathering our best denim, cowboy hats, and all the star jewelry we could find, we're also paying attention to our makeup, nails, and hair to make sure we come correct for the Queen. While it remains to be seen what Bey's beauty looks will be, we're taking notes from the awe-inspiring moments she's delivered since the album's release — from the many red lips she's donned during her casual escapades to her ashy blond, bleached brows for the tour announcement visuals. We predict "Cowboy Carter" outfits will include Americana-inspired metallics and rhinestone-embellished blue jeans, so you can expect to lean into this aesthetic for your beauty details, too. If you're more of a maximalist, feel free to grab multicolored star face jewels to match your American flag-esque star nails or black lipstick to serve as a grungy complement to that black Stetson cowboy hat you've been eyeing. And if you're more of a minimalist, you can achieve your go-to makeup look and let your blond-like-Bey hair speak for itself. Whether you're seeing Beyoncé for the first time or attending this tour after missing out on all the Renaissance fun, we've rounded up the best beauty ideas that are sure to be approved by the star herself. From crystal face gems to bestselling setting spray to keep your glam fresh all night, these are the picks you'll want to secure ASAP. Keep reading to shop our picks for the best "Cowboy Carter"-inspired beauty products.amazon.comBest Beauty Gems For the "Cowboy Carter" TourNooepc Face & Hair Gems ($5) Any opportunity to see Beyoncé merits the "go big or go home" approach, and these gems from Amazon are the perfect way to have your glam fit right in with this concept. You get over 600 pieces for only five dollars (a steal if you ask me), all of which you can use on your makeup or hair. Whether you need an extra zhuzh to go with your smoky eye makeup or want to bedazzle your blond braids, this gem set is a must have.amazon.comBest Star Nails for the "Cowboy Carter" TourAlmond Press On Black Star Nails ($7) There's nothing more American than the 50 stars on the flag, and these black star nails are the perfect way to put your own flair on it. We love the shiny rhinestones even more, a detail that Beyoncé sports on many of her sets.amazon.comBest Primer for the "Cowboy Carter" Toure.l.f. Power Grip Primer ($10) Apart from all the blue, white, and red cosmetics you can find, you're going to want to wear a great primer for your makeup. Made with ingredients like hyaluronic acid, this bestseller (and my personal favorite) helps your glam stay seamless for hours without creasing or looking artificial. Best results are achieved when you let it sit for 30 seconds before applying makeup.sephora.comBest Edge Control For the "Cowboy Carter" TourPattern Edge Control ($14) This edge gel approved by Tracee Ellis Ross herself is made with ingredients like camellia sinensis leaf extract, cucumber fruit extract, and aloe leaf juice — all perfect for laying down your baby hairs without breaking them. Customers say a little goes a long way and it's durable, even for 4C hair.amazon.comBest Red Nails for the "Cowboy Carter" TourGlamnetic Press On Nails - Fiery Red ($15) Apart from extravagant sets with embellished designs, Queen Bey has also been seen wearing red nails on many occasions — even before her "Cowboy Carter" era. These nails from Glamnetic are the perfect pop of color to complement your concert outfit, especially if you're sporting denim on denim.PS Photography | Valeriya ChupininaBest Setting Spray For the "Cowboy Carter" TourOne/Size by Patrick Starrr Mini On 'Til Dawn Mattifying Waterproof Setting Spray ($17) During a D.C. stop on her iconic "Renaissance" Tour, Beyoncé performed in the rain, and her makeup stayed in place without fail. The secret? This setting spray by Patrick Starrr, as revealed by her makeup artist, Rokael Lizama. One of our writers even put it to the test and experienced amazing results. Read her full review of the One/Size On 'Til Dawn Setting Spray here. Editor Quote: "As an oily girl, it is super difficult to find a setting spray that actually delivers what it promises but the One/Size On 'Til Dawn Setting Spray works like a charm." — Valeriya Chupinina, contributor sephora.comBest Eyeliner For the "Cowboy Carter" TourHuda Beauty Creamy Kohl Longwear Eye Pencil ($21) In case you've been on the hunt for the perfect eyeliner to elevate your glam, this pick from Huda Beauty is it. It's a hybrid gel eyeliner pencil with a soft melting point, allowing it to glide across your eyelids with ease and deliver a rich, matte finish. It's also transfer-proof and waterproof, enhancing the shape of your eyes all night long. sephora.comBest Blush For the "Cowboy Carter" TourRare Beauty Soft Pinch Liquid Blush ($25) As one of the more pigmented blushes on the market, Selena Gomez's liquid formula promises up to 12-hour wear. It's available in two finishes (matte and radiant) across 13 wearable and buildable shades. Customers love it for its glow and seamless blending ability.etsy.comBest Press-On Nails For the "Cowboy Carter" TourBClawed Star Spangled Bang I Press On Nails ($28) Inspired by the superstar's unforgettable Christmas Day halftime show that showed a "BANG" flag, these press-ons from BClawed just scream "Cowboy Carter." Whether you're wearing denim, white, or silver, this set is sure to give your look that perfect finishing touch. It would simply be a crime not to wear them to this tour.PS Photography | Renee RodriguezPS Photography | Jessica HarringtonPS Photography | Naomi ParrisBest Mascara For the "Cowboy Carter" TourMakeup by Mario Master Mascara ($28) In case you're not in the mood for faux lashes, you can easily elevate your natural ones with the latest product to come from Makeup by Mario's genius lineup: this volumizing mascara. Three of our editors can attest to the staying power and full lift it promises, with one stating, "It didn't clump my lashes together like my other mascaras tend to do, making my eyes pop instantly." Find out more in this review of the Makeup by Mario Master Mascara.Editor Quote: "I tested it for the first time on a rainy day in New York where I was running around for 14 hours straight, and I didn't experience any fallout or smudging, which is a major win." — Jessica Harrington, senior editor, Beautytartecosmetics.comBest Concealer For the "Cowboy Carter" TourTarte Shape Tape Concealer ($32) Whether you're going for a natural moment or full-blown makeup, the key to any amazing glam is concealer. This cult-favorite one from Tarte promises full coverage with a natural matte finish for up to 16 hours, and even features skin-loving ingredients like shea butter and licorice root to help retain the skin's elasticity and brighten dark circles. With over 25,000 five-star reviews, we're definitely influenced.PS Photography | Naomi ParrisBest Foundation For the "Cowboy Carter" TourMilk Makeup Hydro Grip Gel Skin Tint ($36) When it comes to planning your concert makeup, it's important to secure a base that will last the whole night without oil buildup, creasing, or oxidizing overtime. Milk Makeup's coveted skin tint definitely fits the bill, thanks to ingredients like hyaluronic acid and niacinamide that improve skin texture and boost hydration. And of course, it's PS editor-approved — our editor wore it for eight hours and experienced zero creasing. You can read her full review of the Milk Makeup Hydro Grip Gel Skin Tint here. Editor Quote: "I've tried sweat-proof foundations and some of the best setting powders on the market, but the formula would still feel heavy after a few hours. Fortunately, I've found this as the perfect base product to help me solve this problem without compromising on coverage." — Naomi Parris, assistant editor, ShoppingPS Photography | Ariel BakerBest Hair Lotion For the "Cowboy Carter" TourCécred Moisture Sealing Lotion ($38) There's no better brand to shop for your tour hair than Beyoncé's own Cécred. Just a little more than a year in the industry, the entertainer's hair-care line has received multiple awards and impressed several of our editors. We tried the hair lotion on three different hair textures (from thick to fine), and it surely delivered its promises of locking in moisture, fighting frizz, and sealing split ends. You can read more about why our editors are obsessed in their full review of the Cécred Moisture Sealing Lotion. Editor Quote: "My extensions were already styled straight, so the lotion added incredible shine and provided frizz control, but what really impressed me was how it worked on my natural hair. When using it dry, you're supposed to use a styling tool, so I opted for the Dyson Airwrap. At first, I thought the blowdryer gave me those results, but when they persisted for three days after use with my normal sleeping habits (I don't wrap my hair and sleep like an animal), I knew that I had the lotion to thank. Moving forward, this will be a staple in my hair routine." — Ariel Baker, former assistant editor, Beautysephora.comBest Lipstick For the "Cowboy Carter" TourYves Saint Laurent Rouge Pur Couture Caring Satin Lipstick ($48) Red lipstick has almost become synonymous with Beyoncé, and this satin formula from Yves Saint Laurent feels all-Americana. It's formulated with ceramides, Moroccan tuberose extract, and cactus fig flower extract to give your lips that smooth and hydrating finish.sephora.comBest Eyeshadow Palette For the "Cowboy Carter" TourMakeup by Mario Master Metallics Eyeshadow Palette ($50) While red, white, and blue have become a central theme for "Cowboy Carter," we've seen Queen Bey pair many of her country-inspired looks with metallic eye moments. In case you're taking cues from her, or just want to try something new, consider this palette from Makeup by Mario. It has 12 different shades that can be mixed and matched, from muted tones to more pigmented tones. Plus, metallics are sure to make your eyes pop best at night.PS Photography | Jessica HarringtonBest Curling Iron for the "Cowboy Carter" TourMermade Pro Hair 1.25-Inch Waver ($79) Inspired by Queen Bey's effortless bouncy waves? Consider this curling iron from Mermade. The hybrid beauty tool's flattened design creates a stunning crimped look, and it's so easy to use. It's even TikTok- and PS editor-approved. Read our review of the Mermade Hair Curling Iron to learn more.Editor Quote: "At first, I was afraid the waves would be reminiscent of my crimped hair days in elementary school, but I couldn't have been more wrong — my whole head was covered in bouncy, soft, mermaid waves. My fine hair was full of volume, and the result looked effortless and relaxed, not too polished like my curls typically looked. Considering I would have never been able to achieve this look with a normal curling iron, I'd say this hot tool has earned itself a permanent home in my collection." — JHPS Photography | Kayla GreavesBest Perfume For the "Cowboy Carter" TourValentino Private Talk Perfume ($165) While you're singing "II Hands II Heaven" at the top of your lungs, you'll want to make sure you still smell good after hours of being in the stadium. This pick from Valentino's Anatomy of Dreams collection is the perfect fragrance to accomplish just that. Made with notes of tuberose, ginger, and coffee (yes, you read that right), the scent creates an alluring vibe that actually lasts. It's also editor-approved, with one coining it as her new date night perfume. You can read her in-depth review of the Valentino Private Talk Perfume here. Editor Quote: "From the deep amber color of the juice to the surprising key note accord, which is composed of ultra-feminine tuberose and striking cappuccino, this scent is both bold, yet soft. Sensual, yet reserved. The way it teetered each extreme was intriguing — it's how I knew it was the one for me." — Kayla Greaves, contributorNaomi Parris is the assistant shopping editor at PS, based in New York. With over eight years of experience and previous roles held on the brand's Beauty and Operations teams, she enjoys telling stories that merge fashion, beauty, and Black culture. Naomi has also lent her skillful pen to Essence Girls United, Elle, Bustle, and Elite Daily. When she's not crafting shopping roundups, high-profile features, beauty op-eds, or trend guides, you can find Naomi behind her blog "Eli-Nay," where she inspires readers through style guides, cultural pieces, and innovative content on her Instagram.
html:
While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

Ever since Beyoncé stunned the world with her foray into country music with the once-controversial-now-Grammy-winning "Cowboy Carter" album last year, our eyes have been glued to social media awaiting news of another worldwide tour. Feb. 1 became our lucky day when the legend announced she's hitting the road once again. While it won't be as lengthy as the iconic "Renaissance" World Tour that defined our summers nearly two years in a row, the 32-show rodeo is scheduled to commence at the end of this month, lasting through the end of July, which of course requires some serious preparation (like with anything involving Beyoncé).

While we're gathering our best denim, cowboy hats, and all the star jewelry we could find, we're also paying attention to our makeup, nails, and hair to make sure we come correct for the Queen. While it remains to be seen what Bey's beauty looks will be, we're taking notes from the awe-inspiring moments she's delivered since the album's release — from the many red lips she's donned during her casual escapades to her ashy blond, bleached brows for the tour announcement visuals. We predict "Cowboy Carter" outfits will include Americana-inspired metallics and rhinestone-embellished blue jeans, so you can expect to lean into this aesthetic for your beauty details, too.

If you're more of a maximalist, feel free to grab multicolored star face jewels to match your American flag-esque star nails or black lipstick to serve as a grungy complement to that black Stetson cowboy hat you've been eyeing. And if you're more of a minimalist, you can achieve your go-to makeup look and let your blond-like-Bey hair speak for itself. Whether you're seeing Beyoncé for the first time or attending this tour after missing out on all the Renaissance fun, we've rounded up the best beauty ideas that are sure to be approved by the star herself. From crystal face gems to bestselling setting spray to keep your glam fresh all night, these are the picks you'll want to secure ASAP.

Keep reading to shop our picks for the best "Cowboy Carter"-inspired beauty products.

Best Beauty Gems For the "Cowboy Carter" Tour

Nooepc Face & Hair Gems ($5)

Any opportunity to see Beyoncé merits the "go big or go home" approach, and these gems from Amazon are the perfect way to have your glam fit right in with this concept. You get over 600 pieces for only five dollars (a steal if you ask me), all of which you can use on your makeup or hair. Whether you need an extra zhuzh to go with your smoky eye makeup or want to bedazzle your blond braids, this gem set is a must have.

Best Star Nails for the "Cowboy Carter" Tour

Almond Press On Black Star Nails ($7)

There's nothing more American than the 50 stars on the flag, and these black star nails are the perfect way to put your own flair on it. We love the shiny rhinestones even more, a detail that Beyoncé sports on many of her sets.

Best Primer for the "Cowboy Carter" Tour

e.l.f. Power Grip Primer ($10)

Apart from all the blue, white, and red cosmetics you can find, you're going to want to wear a great primer for your makeup. Made with ingredients like hyaluronic acid, this bestseller (and my personal favorite) helps your glam stay seamless for hours without creasing or looking artificial. Best results are achieved when you let it sit for 30 seconds before applying makeup.

Best Edge Control For the "Cowboy Carter" Tour

Pattern Edge Control ($14)

This edge gel approved by Tracee Ellis Ross herself is made with ingredients like camellia sinensis leaf extract, cucumber fruit extract, and aloe leaf juice — all perfect for laying down your baby hairs without breaking them. Customers say a little goes a long way and it's durable, even for 4C hair.

Best Red Nails for the "Cowboy Carter" Tour

Glamnetic Press On Nails - Fiery Red ($15)

Apart from extravagant sets with embellished designs, Queen Bey has also been seen wearing red nails on many occasions — even before her "Cowboy Carter" era. These nails from Glamnetic are the perfect pop of color to complement your concert outfit, especially if you're sporting denim on denim.

Best Setting Spray For the "Cowboy Carter" Tour

One/Size by Patrick Starrr Mini On 'Til Dawn Mattifying Waterproof Setting Spray ($17)

During a D.C. stop on her iconic "Renaissance" Tour, Beyoncé performed in the rain, and her makeup stayed in place without fail. The secret? This setting spray by Patrick Starrr, as revealed by her makeup artist, Rokael Lizama. One of our writers even put it to the test and experienced amazing results. Read her full review of the One/Size On 'Til Dawn Setting Spray here.

Editor Quote: "As an oily girl, it is super difficult to find a setting spray that actually delivers what it promises but the One/Size On 'Til Dawn Setting Spray works like a charm." — Valeriya Chupinina, contributor

Best Eyeliner For the "Cowboy Carter" Tour

Huda Beauty Creamy Kohl Longwear Eye Pencil ($21)

In case you've been on the hunt for the perfect eyeliner to elevate your glam, this pick from Huda Beauty is it. It's a hybrid gel eyeliner pencil with a soft melting point, allowing it to glide across your eyelids with ease and deliver a rich, matte finish. It's also transfer-proof and waterproof, enhancing the shape of your eyes all night long.

Best Blush For the "Cowboy Carter" Tour

Rare Beauty Soft Pinch Liquid Blush ($25)

As one of the more pigmented blushes on the market, Selena Gomez's liquid formula promises up to 12-hour wear. It's available in two finishes (matte and radiant) across 13 wearable and buildable shades. Customers love it for its glow and seamless blending ability.

Best Press-On Nails For the "Cowboy Carter" Tour

BClawed Star Spangled Bang I Press On Nails ($28)

Inspired by the superstar's unforgettable Christmas Day halftime show that showed a "BANG" flag, these press-ons from BClawed just scream "Cowboy Carter." Whether you're wearing denim, white, or silver, this set is sure to give your look that perfect finishing touch. It would simply be a crime not to wear them to this tour.

Best Mascara For the "Cowboy Carter" Tour

Makeup by Mario Master Mascara ($28)

In case you're not in the mood for faux lashes, you can easily elevate your natural ones with the latest product to come from Makeup by Mario's genius lineup: this volumizing mascara. Three of our editors can attest to the staying power and full lift it promises, with one stating, "It didn't clump my lashes together like my other mascaras tend to do, making my eyes pop instantly." Find out more in this review of the Makeup by Mario Master Mascara.

Editor Quote: "I tested it for the first time on a rainy day in New York where I was running around for 14 hours straight, and I didn't experience any fallout or smudging, which is a major win." — Jessica Harrington, senior editor, Beauty

Best Concealer For the "Cowboy Carter" Tour

Tarte Shape Tape Concealer ($32)

Whether you're going for a natural moment or full-blown makeup, the key to any amazing glam is concealer. This cult-favorite one from Tarte promises full coverage with a natural matte finish for up to 16 hours, and even features skin-loving ingredients like shea butter and licorice root to help retain the skin's elasticity and brighten dark circles. With over 25,000 five-star reviews, we're definitely influenced.

Best Foundation For the "Cowboy Carter" Tour

Milk Makeup Hydro Grip Gel Skin Tint ($36)

When it comes to planning your concert makeup, it's important to secure a base that will last the whole night without oil buildup, creasing, or oxidizing overtime. Milk Makeup's coveted skin tint definitely fits the bill, thanks to ingredients like hyaluronic acid and niacinamide that improve skin texture and boost hydration. And of course, it's PS editor-approved — our editor wore it for eight hours and experienced zero creasing. You can read her full review of the Milk Makeup Hydro Grip Gel Skin Tint here.

Editor Quote: "I've tried sweat-proof foundations and some of the best setting powders on the market, but the formula would still feel heavy after a few hours. Fortunately, I've found this as the perfect base product to help me solve this problem without compromising on coverage." — Naomi Parris, assistant editor, Shopping

Best Hair Lotion For the "Cowboy Carter" Tour

Cécred Moisture Sealing Lotion ($38)

There's no better brand to shop for your tour hair than Beyoncé's own Cécred. Just a little more than a year in the industry, the entertainer's hair-care line has received multiple awards and impressed several of our editors. We tried the hair lotion on three different hair textures (from thick to fine), and it surely delivered its promises of locking in moisture, fighting frizz, and sealing split ends. You can read more about why our editors are obsessed in their full review of the Cécred Moisture Sealing Lotion.

Editor Quote: "My extensions were already styled straight, so the lotion added incredible shine and provided frizz control, but what really impressed me was how it worked on my natural hair. When using it dry, you're supposed to use a styling tool, so I opted for the Dyson Airwrap. At first, I thought the blowdryer gave me those results, but when they persisted for three days after use with my normal sleeping habits (I don't wrap my hair and sleep like an animal), I knew that I had the lotion to thank. Moving forward, this will be a staple in my hair routine." — Ariel Baker, former assistant editor, Beauty

Best Lipstick For the "Cowboy Carter" Tour

Yves Saint Laurent Rouge Pur Couture Caring Satin Lipstick ($48)

Red lipstick has almost become synonymous with Beyoncé, and this satin formula from Yves Saint Laurent feels all-Americana. It's formulated with ceramides, Moroccan tuberose extract, and cactus fig flower extract to give your lips that smooth and hydrating finish.

Best Eyeshadow Palette For the "Cowboy Carter" Tour

Makeup by Mario Master Metallics Eyeshadow Palette ($50)

While red, white, and blue have become a central theme for "Cowboy Carter," we've seen Queen Bey pair many of her country-inspired looks with metallic eye moments. In case you're taking cues from her, or just want to try something new, consider this palette from Makeup by Mario. It has 12 different shades that can be mixed and matched, from muted tones to more pigmented tones. Plus, metallics are sure to make your eyes pop best at night.

Best Curling Iron for the "Cowboy Carter" Tour

Mermade Pro Hair 1.25-Inch Waver ($79)

Inspired by Queen Bey's effortless bouncy waves? Consider this curling iron from Mermade. The hybrid beauty tool's flattened design creates a stunning crimped look, and it's so easy to use. It's even TikTok- and PS editor-approved. Read our review of the Mermade Hair Curling Iron to learn more.

Editor Quote: "At first, I was afraid the waves would be reminiscent of my crimped hair days in elementary school, but I couldn't have been more wrong — my whole head was covered in bouncy, soft, mermaid waves. My fine hair was full of volume, and the result looked effortless and relaxed, not too polished like my curls typically looked. Considering I would have never been able to achieve this look with a normal curling iron, I'd say this hot tool has earned itself a permanent home in my collection." — JH

Best Perfume For the "Cowboy Carter" Tour

Valentino Private Talk Perfume ($165)

While you're singing "II Hands II Heaven" at the top of your lungs, you'll want to make sure you still smell good after hours of being in the stadium. This pick from Valentino's Anatomy of Dreams collection is the perfect fragrance to accomplish just that. Made with notes of tuberose, ginger, and coffee (yes, you read that right), the scent creates an alluring vibe that actually lasts. It's also editor-approved, with one coining it as her new date night perfume. You can read her in-depth review of the Valentino Private Talk Perfume here.

Editor Quote: "From the deep amber color of the juice to the surprising key note accord, which is composed of ultra-feminine tuberose and striking cappuccino, this scent is both bold, yet soft. Sensual, yet reserved. The way it teetered each extreme was intriguing — it's how I knew it was the one for me." — Kayla Greaves, contributor

Naomi Parris is the assistant shopping editor at PS, based in New York. With over eight years of experience and previous roles held on the brand's Beauty and Operations teams, she enjoys telling stories that merge fashion, beauty, and Black culture. Naomi has also lent her skillful pen to Essence Girls United, Elle, Bustle, and Elite Daily. When she's not crafting shopping roundups, high-profile features, beauty op-eds, or trend guides, you can find Naomi behind her blog "Eli-Nay," where she inspires readers through style guides, cultural pieces, and innovative content on her Instagram.
